originalText.text: I wanted to update my review with Dr. Pascario. My health is still great and he keeps a close eye. He really loves his profession and cares for his patients. It’s been over 7years and I couldn’t be more grateful and happy! To all those who want the best care. He’s your doctor. Still recommend him dearly. Best gynecologist!

text.text: I wanted to update my review with Dr. Pascario. My health is still great and he keeps a close eye. He really loves his profession and cares for his patients. It’s been over 7years and I couldn’t be more grateful and happy! To all those who want the best care. He’s your doctor. Still recommend him dearly. Best gynecologist!

originalText.text: A friend recommended Dr. Pascario when I first came in NYC, nearly in my seventh month. And he turned out to be God Sent. I really couldn’t have been in a better care than him. He has a way of making you feel at ease. I delivered sometime in the middle of the night and he showed up! With his cheerful face and a comforting smile. He knew exactly when I’d be ready to push and deliver- such is his experience.

originalText.text: Dr. Pascario is an excellent Doctor and a beautiful human being.  His staff and office is very professiona, and compassionate and warm at the same time.  He delivered my son .  I always felt secure under his care.

text.text: Dr. Pascario is an excellent Doctor and a beautiful human being.  His staff and office is very professiona, and compassionate and warm at the same time.  He delivered my son .  I always felt secure under his care.

originalText.text: Dr. Pascario is an amazing and caring physician.  He has been in practice for so many years and never fails to spend the time he needs with a patient.  He has been my mothers doctor for over 20 years and saved her life basically.  The office is clean, the staff is friendly and he is really a god send.

He has been my mothers doctor for over 20 years and saved her life basically.  The office is clean, the staff is friendly and he is really a god send.

originalText.text: The best doctor you will find out there! He is straight to the point and he takes care of you like you are his own child. He makes sure your pregnancy is perfectly safe and if you feel emotional or sad he is there to comfort you and make you feel better. He delivered 5 babies in my family including my son and he made sure we were taking care of until last day!
